Articles.Content:
I've been playing Kerbal Space Program V1.1.2, I've been having crashes, the crashes aren't very frequent though.

The crashes mostly happen when I'm switching between crafts ([ and ]).

Computer Qualifications:

Processor: Intel Core i3 4160 CPU @ 3.60 GHz

RAM: 8 GB

System Type: 64 bit (Note: I AM using the KSP_64)

I appreciate any help.

Thanks,

Waseem. 

Edited July 26, 2016 by Waseemq1235
To change title to solved.
The 1.1.2 version suffers from some random crashes that can happen in every moment. 1.1.3 instead is pretty stable and you'll see your issue solved.

10 hours ago, Nansuchao said:

The 1.1.2 version suffers from some random crashes that can happen in every moment. 1.1.3 instead is pretty stable and you'll see your issue solved.

Thanks, I'll try it out.
